issue.title: atlas_v3_v1_sandia model blows up where old one doesn't

content.raw:
Turns out that it worked if I set all kp_velocity to 0.0.

When I set just the ankle joints to 0.0, the robot slouches to one side. 
It appears the same as if the robot was in manipulate with bad kp_position for back joints.

For STAND mode, none of the gains should be used since k_efforts are all 0.0.
content.html:
Turns out that it worked if I set all kp_velocity to 0.0.

When I set just the ankle joints to 0.0, the robot slouches to one side. It appears the same as if the robot was in manipulate with bad kp_position for back joints.

For STAND mode, none of the gains should be used since k_efforts are all 0.0.
